enhanced_by.reason: The validate method performs similar validation logic and can be used to set up the input for the isValid method.
The checkCode method is invoked within isValid to validate the country code, indicating a state dependency that should be tested.
Both isValid and validate methods perform validation checks and can be used to assert the expected validation results.
The isValid method in CodeValidator performs similar validation logic and can be used to assert the expected behavior of the isValid method in ISINValidator.
